system

Interface Worker2Master

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Master, WorkerProxy

    public interface Worker2Master
extends java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    Defines an interface to register remote (Worker) with the Master.
    Author:
    Prakash Chandrasekaran, Gautham Narayanasamy, Vijayaraghavan Subbaiah

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static java.lang.String SERVICE_NAME

      Defines a deployment convenience to stop each registered Worker and then stop the Master.

      Registers remote workers with the master.
      void shutdown() 
      void superStepCompleted(java.lang.String workerID, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> activeWorkerIDs)
      Send a message to the Master saying that the current superstep has been completed.

        worker2 master
